Description: Rectangular wooden archery case with painted scenes on exterior; contains seven reed arrows with flint heads.
Curator's comments: Published: Eva Kuhnert-Eggebrecht. Die Art. Kat R.56 p. 127. BMA XXXVII 1/2 (Summer 1973) pp. 4-9, pl. II. Davies, Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the BM, VI. Tools and Weapons, I: Axes, (1987), 25, 48, 50, n. 11, 125-9. W. Decker and M. Herb. Bildatlas zum sport im alten Agypten. (Leiden, 1994). M. Stead. Egyptian Life. (1994) pp. 56-7, fig. 76.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
